column3: was a cousin of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (her mother was [[Grace Mountain]]). As a child
column4: J.R.R. Tolkien spent several holidays with his paternal aunt in [[Wikipedia:Northumberland|Northumberland]]
column5: and in later life he renewed the friendship with Dorothy.<ref>''[[Sotheby's English Literature
